SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class represents the Board on which the Game's Tiles are disposed. It may vary in its size and form, depending on the number of Players that will be registered in the lobby when the game starts.
See Also:
  • Game
  • Board
  • Player
  • Tile

    Board(JsonBoardPattern jsonBoardPattern)
    Initializes only the Tiles in the positions where there are ones in the JsonBoardPattern, and set non-usable tiles as tiles without a specified color.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Class constructor. Initializes all Tiles on the board.
      See Also:
      • Tile

    • Board

      public Board(JsonBoardPattern jsonBoardPattern)
      Initializes only the Tiles in the positions where there are ones in the JsonBoardPattern, and set non-usable tiles as tiles without a specified color.
      Parameters:
      jsonBoardPattern - pattern that contains the positions where the tiles can be inserted.
      See Also:
      • JsonBoardPattern
      • Tile

    • Board

      public Board(int numberOfUsableTiles, Tile[][] tiles)
      Initializes the number of usable tiles and the set of tiles that can ben placed on the Board.
      Parameters:
      numberOfUsableTiles - number of Tiles that are usable, set during the Game's creation.
      tiles - matrix with the considered tiles.
      See Also:
      • Tile
      • Game

    • numberOfTilesToRefill

      public int numberOfTilesToRefill()
      The method searches in the board for "lonely" Tiles (without any nearby, adjacent tiles).
      Returns:
      if two or more nearby tiles are found, returns '0', otherwise returns the number of "lonely" tiles.
      See Also:
      • Tile

    • removeTiles

      public void removeTiles(List<Coordinates> coordinates)
      The Player can take some Tiles from the board and keep playing. When they are taken, selected tiles need to be removed from their current position. This method implements tiles removal.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - are the coordinates of the tiles selected by a player to be removed.
      See Also:
      • Player
      • Tile

    • setPattern

      public void setPattern(JsonBoardPattern boardPattern)
      Sets only the Tiles in the positions where there are ones in the JsonBoardPattern, also sets non-usable tiles as tiles without any specific color.
      Parameters:
      boardPattern - pattern that contains the positions where we need to insert the tiles.

      Gets the Tile at the given coordinates, expressed as rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      row - is the first coordinate.
      column - is the second coordinate.
      Returns:

      column - is the second coordinate.
      tile - is the tile's value to be set by the method.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Used to displays a simple representation of the Board.
